name: Safety Glasses USA
overview:
SafetyGlassesUSA.com is a leading online retailer of safety glasses, bifocal safety glasses, shooting glasses, safety goggles, sunglasses and more.

We’re a Veteran-Owned Business and an international distributor of personal protective equipment, with eyewear as our core product. We began in October 2000 with an emphasis on creating a staff knowledgeable about the various safety eyewear styles and uses, and an origianl approach to safety eyewear for the end user. Today our product line features over 30 brands of various safety products and over 2000 styles of safety, sport and fashion eyewear.

Our presence is worldwide, but the heart and soul of our operations are located in the small town of Three Rivers, Michigan, a certified HUBZone. At our Corporate facility, we also offer a large showroom for our local customers to browse, try on, compare and purchase our many styles and selections.
